channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:27 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:27 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:12 Countering the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 12:12 Countering the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 11:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 11:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291#Купянский_район This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
